message.content:
cs.ET, cs.DC, cs.DL, cs.CV, cs.AR

The paper discusses the use of machine learning and pattern matching for lithography hotspot detection, which falls under the category of electronic design automation (EDA) and specifically the sub-category of electronic testing (cs.ET). However, the paper also mentions the use of detailed lithography simulations, which could fall under the sub-category of distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC) or deep learning (cs.DL) for optimization. Additionally, the paper discusses the use of computer vision techniques for pattern matching, which falls under the sub-categories of computer vision (cs.CV) and augmented reality (cs.AR).
